attributes.action: make better use of electronic motorway information signs by placing simple messages/reminders when not being used for other information.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many times have you driven down the motorway with people either tailgating or driving in the middle lane and causing huge tailbacks behind them? or in severe cases accidents?

Of these time, how many times have the electronic information machines just been sitting there not in use?

Why not make better use of these usually idle signs by displaying simple messages such as "Remember drive to the left," or "Tailgating Kills" or "Don't hog the middle lane." The government could even use them for their most traditional "Tiredness can kill, take a break," message.
